title: The Guardian's Kiss
description: NOTE: The current version available is the pre-edited/proofread version. An edited version should be available November 2012.What would you do if you had the survival of mankind weighing on your shoulders? Would you face your true identity, or would you run and hide? Follow Samantha Brand on her journey to understanding her peculiar birth and her supernatural abilities, when an experiment by the government goes awry and the Devil attempts to destroy mankind. A kiss by Samantha's Guardian Angel changes everything. Or could it make things worse? Will her destiny take her down the path that will save those around her? Will she truly have the abilities they say she has? With ethereal gifts and a Guardian to watch over her, Samantha must remember who or what she is to save those she cares for the most.
author: Jamie Lynn Dougherty
